short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables Easiio click to dial functionality for phone numbers found in pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Users need to log in to use the plug-in service. The plug-in can identify the number on the web page, and click on the number to jump to the dialing interface to make a call.
